name: Flitterstep Eidolon
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Evasion
entries: If the eidolon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the eidolon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The eidolon makes two melee attacks. Immediately before or after one of its attacks, it can use Flitterstep if it is available.

actions.name: Flickering Dagger
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flitterstep {@recharge 5}
entries: The eidolon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. If it makes an attack immediately after teleporting, it has advantage on the attack roll.
